SEARCH
Package photos24

Class TagController

java.lang.Object
photos24.TagController
public class TagController extends Object
Controller for managing tags in the Photos24 application.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Picture
    currentPicture
    The Picture object whose tags are being changed.
    private User
    currentUser
    The User object that holds the current picture.
    private javafx.scene.layout.VBox
    mainLayout
    The VBox used in the Tag controller's layout.
    private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    multipleTagGrid
    The GridPane used to view the list of each type of tag available.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button
    saveChangesButton
    The Button used to run the save changes method.
    private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    singularTagGrid
    The GridPane used to view the list of each type of tag available.
    private Map<javafx.scene.control.CheckBox,javafx.util.Pair<javafx.scene.control.TextField,Tag>>
    tagFields
    A map of CheckBox objects that correlate to tag pairs and whether the tag is enabled for the current picture or not.
